# Supplemental Material

```{r Table A snps of interest}
collapsed.list <- lapply(snp.insects, function(x){
  paste(x, collapse = ", ")
})
table <- data.frame(NULL)
for(i in names(collapsed.list)){
  SNP = i
  insects = unlist(collapsed.list[[i]])
  table[i,"SNP"] <- SNP
  table[i,"Insect Associations"] <- insects
}
caption <- paste("SNPs of interest and the insects with which they have",
                 "significant associations")
knitr::kable(table, row.names = FALSE, caption = caption)
```

```{r Fig A full manhattan plots, message=FALSE, fig.cap = caption, out.extra='angle=270', out.width="100%"}
image.paths <- c(list.files("figures/q-manhattan_ggplot/"))
insects <- gsub(image.paths,pattern = "ggM.*plot_(.*)\\.png",replacement = "\\1")
insects <- gsub(insects, pattern = "-", replacement = " ")
insects <- gsub(insects, pattern = "Blackmine", replacement = "Blackmine Beetle")
caption <- c(rep(NA,length(image.paths) - 1),"caption for reals")

caption <- NULL
for (i in 1:length(insects)) {
  caption[insects[i]] <- paste0("Fig A.",i, ": Full Manhattan\n Plot of ",
                                insects[i],". SNPs of interest are colored red")
}
par(mfrow = c(1,2))
knitr::include_graphics(path = paste0("../figures/q-manhattan_ggplot/",
                                      image.paths))
```
